ANL.description:
Performs a bitwise AND operation between operands.

Does not affect value of second operand.

ORL.description:
Performs a bitwise OR operation between operands.

Does not affect value of second operand.

XRL.description:
Performs a bitwise XOR operation between operands.

Does not affect value of second operand.

CLR.description: Clear (set to 0) value of the Accumulator, the Carry flag or a bit in RAM

CPL.description:
Complements (reverses) value of the Accumulator, the Carry flag or a bit in RAM.

The Carry flag or bit in RAM is:
 - unset (0) if it was set (1)
 - set (1) if it was unset (0)

Each bit in the Accumulator is subjected to the same operation as Carry flag or bit in RAM.

> If value of Accumulator was 10101001 then it will be set to 01010110

RL.description:
Shifts bits of value stored in the Accumulator to the left.

The most significant bit is moved to the least significant bit.

RLC.description:
Shifts bits of value stored in the Accumulator to the left trough the Carry flag.

Value of the Carry flag is moved to the least significant bit of the Accumulator.

The most significant bit is moved to the Carry flag.

Can be used to multiply number by 2

RR.description:
Shifts bits of value stored in the Accumulator to the right.

The least significant bit is moved to the most significant bit.

RRC.description:
Shifts bits of value stored in the Accumulator to the right trough the Carry flag.

Value of the Carry flag is moved to the most significant bit of the Accumulator.

The least significant bit is moved to the Carry flag.

Can be used to divide number by 2

SWAP.description:
Swap the most significant nibble of the Accumulator with the least significant nibble.

End result will be the same as rotating Accumulator value 4 times.

SETB.description: Set (to 1) value of the Carry flag or a bit in RAM
